properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 19 at 2:13PM PST until January 21 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts to 30 kt are expected
through Monday. Winds increase to gales 25 to 35 kt with gusts
to 50 kt Monday night, then become southwest 20 to 30 kt
Tuesday. Seas 10 to 15 ft at 15 seconds are expected through
Monday. Seas become very steep and wind driven up to 19 feet
Monday night, then transition to high west swell Tuesday peaking
near 20 feet at 15 seconds before lowering to 15 feet late
Tuesday night.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory is in effect until 4 PM PST
Monday. The Gale Warning is from 4 PM Monday to 4 AM PST
Tuesday, followed by a Hazardous Seas Warning which is from 4
AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY
